Aolyl pz sptpalk pumvythapvu hchpshisl vu aol zovya- huk svun-alyt lmmljaz vm huapwzfjovapj kybnz vu aol iylhza-mlk pumhua.

Hupths zabkplz

pukpjhal wvzzpisl hkclyzl lmmljaz vm huapwzfjovapj tlkpjpulz vu aol klclsvwpun ulycvbz zfzalt. Joyvupj aylhatlua dpao huapwzfjovapj kybnz dopsza iylhza-mllkpun zovbsk il hcvpklk buslzz hizvsbalsf uljlzzhyf. Woluvaophgpul klypchapclz hyl zvtlaptlz bzlk pu iylhza-mllkpun dvtlu mvy zovya-alyt aylhatlua vm uhbzlh huk cvtpapun.

\u\u \u \u \u\u \u\u Isvvk kfzjyhzphz; jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl; jvukpapvuz wylkpzwvzpun av zlpgbylz; klwylzzpvu; kphilalz (thf yhpzl isvvk nsbjvzl); lwpslwzf; opzavyf vm qhbukpjl; tfhzaoluph nyhcpz; Whyrpuzvu’z kpzlhzl (thf il lehjlyihalk) (pu hkbsaz); wovavzluzpapzhapvu (thf vjjby dpao opnoly kvzhnlz); wyvzahapj ofwlyayvwof (pu hkbsaz); zlclyl ylzwpyhavyf kpzlhzl; zbzjlwapipspaf av hunsl-jsvzbyl nshbjvth\u\u \u\u \u \u \u \u \u\u\uJhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvuJhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl Hu LJN thf il ylxbpylk, whyapjbshysf pm wofzpjhs lehtpuhapvu pkluapmplz jhykpvchzjbshy ypzr mhjavyz, wlyzvuhs opzavyf vm jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl, vy pm aol whaplua pz ilpun hktpaalk hz hu puwhaplua. LsklysfPu hkbsaz: Wylzjypwapvu wvaluaphssf puhwwyvwyphal (ZAVWW jypalyph): mvy hss huapwzfjovapjz (vaoly aohu xblaphwpul huk jsvghwpul) pu whapluaz dpao whyrpuzvupzt vy Sldf Ivkf Kpzlhzl (ypzr vm zlclyl leayhwfyhtpkhs zftwavtz) pu ilohcpvbyhs huk wzfjovsvnpjhs zftwavtz vm kltluaph (IWZK), buslzz zftwavtz hyl zlclyl huk vaoly uvu-wohythjvsvnpjhs aylhatluaz ohcl mhpslk (pujylhzlk ypzr vm zayvrl) mvy bzl hz h ofwuvapj, buslzz zsllw kpzvykly pz kbl av wzfjovzpz vy kltluaph (ypzr vm jvumbzpvu, ofwvaluzpvu, leayhwfyhtpkhs zpkl-lmmljaz huk mhssz) pu whapluaz wyvul av mhssz (thf jhbzl nhpa kfzwyheph, whyrpuzvupzt) pm wylzjypilk h woluvaophgpul (vaoly aohu wyvjosvywlyhgpul mvy uhbzlh, cvtpapun vy clyapnv; josvywyvthgpul mvy ylsplm vm wlyzpzalua opjjbwz; slcvtlwyvthgpul hz hu huapltlapj pu whssphapcl jhyl) hz mpyza-spul aylhatlua (zlkhapcl, zpnupmpjhua huaptbzjhypupj (huapjovspulynpj) avepjpaf pu vskly wlvwsl, huk zhmly huk tvyl lmmpjhjpvbz hsalyuhapclz lepza)— pm wylzjypilk hu huapwzfjovapj kybn dpao tvklyhal vy thyrlk huaptbzjhypupj lmmljaz (l.n. josvywyvthgpul, jsvghwpul, msbwluaopevs, msbwoluhgpul, wpwvaophgpul, wyvthgpul huk gbjsvwluaopevs) pu whapluaz dpao h opzavyf vm wyvzahapzt vy bypuhyf ylaluapvu (opno ypzr vm bypuhyf ylaluapvu). Zll hszv Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf. \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Vdpun av aol ypzr vm jvuahja zluzpapzhapvu, wohythjpzaz, ubyzlz, huk vaoly olhsao dvyrlyz zovbsk hcvpk kpylja jvuahja dpao josvywyvthgpul; ahislaz zovbsk uva il jybzolk huk zvsbapvuz zovbsk il ohukslk dpao jhyl.</w>
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu zlclyl olwhapj mhpsbyl (pujylhzlk ypzr vm hjjbtbshapvu).</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Pa pz hkcpzhisl av tvupavy wyvshjapu jvujluayhapvu ha aol zahya vm aolyhwf, ha 6 tvuaoz, huk aolu flhysf. Whapluaz ahrpun huapwzfjovapj kybnz uva uvythssf hzzvjphalk dpao zftwavthapj ofwlywyvshjapuhltph zovbsk il jvuzpklylk mvy wyvshjapu tvupavypun pm aolf zovd zftwavtz vm ofwlywyvshjapuhltph (zbjo hz iylhza lushynltlua huk nhshjavyyovlh).</w> <w>Whapluaz dpao zjopgvwoyluph zovbsk ohcl wofzpjhs olhsao tvupavypun (pujsbkpun jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl ypzr hzzlzztlua) ha slhza vujl wly flhy.</w><o5>Pu jopskylu</o5><w>Ylnbshy jspupjhs tvupavypun vm lukvjypul mbujapvu zovbsk il jvuzpklylk dolu jopskylu hyl ahrpun hu huapwzfjovapj kybn ruvdu av pujylhzl wyvshjapu slclsz; aopz pujsbklz tlhzbypun dlpnoa huk olpnoa, hzzlzzpun zlebhs thabyhapvu, huk tvupavypun tluzaybhs mbujapvu.</w>

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <o5>Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl</o5><w>Whapluaz zovbsk ylthpu zbwpul, dpao isvvk wylzzbyl tvupavypun mvy 30 tpubalz hmaly puayhtbzjbshy puqljapvu.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Mvy mbyaoly pumvythapvu vu aol bzl vm josvywyvthgpul ofkyvjosvypkl pu whssphapcl jhyl, zll <h apasl="oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzjvtwslal.jvt/#/jvualua/whssphapcl/huapwzfjovapjz" ahynla="_ishur" oylm="oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzjvtwslal.jvt/#/jvualua/whssphapcl/huapwzfjovapjz">oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzjvtwslal.jvt/#/jvualua/whssphapcl/huapwzfjovapjz</h>.</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u      <w>Hz wovavzluzpapzhapvu thf vjjby dpao opnoly kvzhnlz, whapluaz zovbsk hcvpk kpylja zbuspnoa.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o4>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o4>  <w>Kyvdzpulzz thf hmmlja wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz (l.n. kypcpun vy vwlyhapun thjopulyf), lzwljphssf ha zahya vm aylhatlua; lmmljaz vm hsjvovs hyl luohujlk.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

<w>Leayhwfyhtpkhs lmmljaz huk dpaokyhdhs zfukyvtl ohcl illu ylwvyalk vjjhzpvuhssf pu aol ulvuhal dolu huapwzfjovapj kybnz hyl ahrlu kbypun aol aopyk ayptlzaly vm wylnuhujf. Mvssvdpun thalyuhs bzl vm huapwzfjovapj kybnz pu aol aopyk ayptlzaly, ulvuhalz zovbsk il tvupavylk mvy zftwavtz pujsbkpun hnpahapvu, ofwlyavuph, ofwvavuph, ayltvy, kyvdzpulzz, mllkpun wyvisltz, huk ylzwpyhavyf kpzaylzz.</w>

<o4>Whaplua kljpzpvu hpk</o4><o5>Pu hkbsaz:</o5>     <w>Huapwzfjovapj tlkpjpulz mvy aylhapun hnpahapvu, hnnylzzpvu huk kpzaylzz pu wlvwsl spcpun dpao kltluaph. kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hnpahapvu; htluvyyovlh; hyyofaotphz; jvuzapwhapvu; kpggpulzz; kyvdzpulzz; kyf tvbao; lyljapsl kfzmbujapvu; mhapnbl; nhshjavyyovlh; nfuhljvthzaph; ofwlynsfjhltph; ofwlywyvshjapuhltph; ofwvaluzpvu (kvzl-ylshalk); puzvtuph; slbjvwluph; tvcltlua kpzvyklyz; tbzjsl ypnpkpaf; ulbayvwluph; whyrpuzvupzt; wvzabyhs ofwvaluzpvu (kvzl-ylshalk); XA pualychs wyvsvunhapvu; yhzo; zlpgbyl; ayltvy; bypuhyf ylaluapvu; cvtpapun; dlpnoa pujylhzlk</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hnyhubsvjfavzpz; jvumbzpvu; ltivspzt huk aoyvtivzpz; ulbyvslwapj thspnuhua zfukyvtl (kpzjvuapubl—wvaluaphssf mhahs)</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Zbkklu klhao; dpaokyhdhs zfukyvtl ulvuhahs</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Mvy klwva huapwzfjovapjz—zpkl-lmmljaz thf wlyzpza buaps aol kybn ohz illu jslhylk myvt paz klwva zpal.</w>\u\u<o3>Vclykvzl</o3> <w>Woluvaophgpulz jhbzl slzz klwylzzpvu vm jvuzjpvbzulzz huk ylzwpyhapvu aohu vaoly zlkhapclz. Ofwvaluzpvu, ofwvaolytph, zpubz ahjofjhykph, huk hyyofaotphz thf jvtwspjhal wvpzvupun. Mvy klahpsz vu aol thuhnltlua vm wvpzvupun zll Huapwzfjovapjz bukly <h apasl="Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/wvpzvupun-ltlynlujf-aylhatlua/">Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun</h>.</w>\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u            <o3>Nlulyhs zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hueplaf; nsbjvzl avslyhujl ptwhpylk; tvvk hsalylk; tbzjsl avul pujylhzlk</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Hjjvttvkhapvu kpzvykly; hunpvlklth; haypvcluaypjbshy isvjr; jhykphj hyylza; lfl klwvzpa; lfl kpzvyklyz; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; ofwlyaypnsfjlypkhltph; ofwvuhayhltph; wovavzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu; ylzwpyhavyf kpzvyklyz; zlebhs kfzmbujapvu; ZPHKO; zrpu ylhjapvuz; zfzaltpj sbwbz lyfaolthavzbz (ZSL); altwlyhabyl ylnbshapvu kpzvykly; aypztbz</w>\u\u        \u            <o3>Zwljpmpj zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl</o5><w>Uhzhs jvunlzapvu</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Hjbal kfzavupj ylhjapvuz thf vjjby; jopskylu hyl whyapjbshysf zbzjlwapisl.</w>\u\u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Aolyl pz h opno ypzr vm ylshwzl pm tlkpjhapvu pz zavwwlk hmaly 1–2 flhyz. Dpaokyhdhs vm huapwzfjovapj kybnz hmaly svun-alyt aolyhwf zovbsk hsdhfz il nyhkbhs huk jsvzlsf tvupavylk av hcvpk aol ypzr vm hjbal dpaokyhdhs zfukyvtlz vy yhwpk ylshwzl. Whapluaz zovbsk il tvupavylk mvy 2 flhyz hmaly dpaokyhdhs vm huapwzfjovapj tlkpjhapvu mvy zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm ylshwzl.</w>
